subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Boxing
lead_paragraph: Bernie Friedkin, a former street kid from Brownsville, Brooklyn, was a professional boxer in the late 1930s and early ’40s who battled many of his opponents to a draw — including three former lightweight champions.
snippet: Bernie Friedkin, a former street kid from Brownsville, Brooklyn, was a professional boxer in the late 1930s and early ’40s who battled many of his opponents to a draw — including three former lightweight champions.
